item.title: 1411: Number of Ways to Paint N × 3 Grid
item.description: In this post, I will talk about my solution to Problem #1411 in LeetCode, on the number of ways to paint an N×3 grid   , and how a problem on dynamic programming can be solved using some combinatorics to reach a very quick 0 ms solution in linear time.
